snippet: A Berkeley zoologist writes, “Neither tourism nor hunting returns enough money to local people to make up for the depredations of wildlife.”
lead_paragraph: A Berkeley zoologist writes, “Neither tourism nor hunting returns enough money to local people to make up for the depredations of wildlife.”

headline.print_headline: The Tragedies in the Story of Cecil the Lion
headline.main: The Tragedies in the Story of Cecil the Lion
